EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-02-08-CWOM Day San Jose 3 Day Reminder - 2.CWOM Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Oops! Correction - Cisco Workload Optimization Day San Jose – Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our apologies for the confusion. You are confirmed for Cisco WOM Day San Jose, not Kansas City and should've received this confirmation below.
This is a reminder that you have registered to attend Cisco Workload Optimization Manager (WOM) Day San Jose on February 12 at 300 East Tasman Drive, San Jose, CA.
Cisco WOM Day San Jose is a 3-hour planning session with your regional Cisco field reps, Cisco partners and Turbonomic account executives to discuss how to leverage the Cisco WOM solution to more quickly retire sales quotas. Attend this event to:
- Learn more about the Cisco and Turbonomic Partnership
- Get an in-depth overview of Cisco Workload Optimization Manager
- Understand how Cisco WOM compliments and augments Tetration and AppDynamics
- Participate in discussions with your sales peers on how to engage and position Cisco WOM with customers
Agenda: 2:30 Welcome & Introductions 2:45 Who is Turbonomic? Overview of Turbonomic and Cisco Partnership 3:15 Cisco Workload Optimization Manager & Product Demo 4:15 Break 4:30 Panel Discussion 5:00 Wrap Up 4:30 Panel Discussion 5:30 Cocktail Reception:
Location: Cisco WOM Days Meetings - San Jose Cisco Campus - Building 11 - Exchange Conference Room - 350 Tasman Drive San Jose, CA Cocktail Reception - La Catalana - 3720 N 1st St #10, San Jose, CA 95134
I look forward to seeing you at this event!
Regards, Murphy Vandervelde
